Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the internal functions used by the driver.

Function Documentation

static void WatchdogRTI_callback ( void *  arg)
static

Description
The function is the registered ESM callback function for the Watchdog Driver. This function is used only when the reset mode is set to NMI interrupt mode.

Parameters
[in]argArgument which is registered with the ESM module while registering the notify function.
Return values
Notapplicable
static void WatchdogRTI_clear ( Watchdog_Handle  handle)
static

Description
The function is clears the watchdog to prevent a reset signal or interrupt from being generated. Its the application's responsibilty to clear the watch dog timer.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the Watchdog Driver
Return values
Notapplicable
static void WatchdogRTI_close ( Watchdog_Handle  handle)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the Watchdog Driver instance is being closed

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the Watchdog Driver
Return values
Notapplicable
static int32_t WatchdogRTI_control ( Watchdog_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  cmd,
void *  arg 
)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the Watchdog Driver is being passed a control command.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the Watchdog Driver
[in]cmdWatchdog command
[in]argOpaque handle to the argument
Return values
Success- 0
Error- Watchdog Error code
static void WatchdogRTI_init ( Watchdog_Handle  handle)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the Watchdog driver is initialized.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the Watchdog Driver which is to be initialized.
Return values
Notapplicable
static Watchdog_Handle WatchdogRTI_open ( Watchdog_Handle  handle,
Watchdog_Params *  params 
)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the Watchdog Driver instance is being opened with a specific application supplied arguments.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the Watchdog Driver
[in]paramsWatchdog Parameters with which the driver is being opened
Return values
Success- Driver Handle
Error- NULL
